name: Junko Konno
description: The legendary idol who ignited the idol boom during the 80s. Even after becoming a zombie, she continued her idol career as a member of the Fran Chou Chou living by her "Showa era pride".

passiveSkill.name: The legendary Showa idol
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Junko's HP is near 0, she becomes Zombified, inheriting 150% ATK, 100% DEF and 100% HP. All attacks will target random single enemies and cannot gain Rage.Team Skill: Deploy Sakura, Ai and Junko.Triggered Effect: When Sakura, Ai or Junko attacks, other allied idols will launch a combo attack."}

uniqueSkill.name: Last Song
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Attacks the enemy with the lowest HP and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, inflicting Acrophobia (ineffective against Leader) to the enemy with the lowest HP. If target's Energy is above 14, doubles the damage and restores ATK * 120% HP for 2 allies with the lowest HP."}

specialSkill.name: Wake up!
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Junko deals {placeholder} damage to an enemy and reduces enemy's Heal Rate by 40%Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Fran Chou Chou's No. 4
normalSkill.description: Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Attacks the enemy with the lowest HP and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, inflicting Acrophobia (ineffective against Leader) to the enemy with the lowest HP. If target's Energy is above 14, doubles the damage and restores ATK * 220% HP for 2 allies with the lowest HP.
templateData.lens5.skill: When Junko's HP is near 0, she becomes Zombified, inheriting 150% ATK, 100% DEF and 100% HP. All attacks will target random single enemies and cannot gain Rage.Team Skill: Deploy Sakura, Ai and Junko.Triggered Effect: When Sakura, Ai or Junko attacks, other allied idols will launch a combo attack.
templateData.lens6.skill: Junko deals {placeholder} damage to an enemy and reduces enemy's Heal Rate by 40%Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}
